description: An ACAN is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services or construction to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a statement of capabilities IF.....
tags: Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment
full_summary:
### Public Notice of Contract Award

* **Title (English)**: Rotary Sample Divider (5K003-230712)
* **Title (French)**: DIVISEURS D’ÉCHANTILLON GIRATOIRES (5K003-230712)
* **Reference Number**: WS4272063577
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Publication Date**: October 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 4, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 4, 2026

## Description
The Canadian Grain Commission (CGC) invites interested suppliers to participate in an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the supply and delivery of one (1) rotary sample divider (RSD) including vibratory feeders and dividing modules. The option to purchase two (2) additional RSDs in the next two years is also included. The equipment must be delivered on or before February 15, 2024.

### Selection Criteria
No selection criteria apply in this tender.

### Trade Agreements
Suppliers must comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Delivery Regions
Deliveries are restricted to the province of Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or requests for clarification on the tender, please contact:
- Name: Cheng, Sabrina
- Email: [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

To participate in this tender, suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities by November 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

## Web link to the solicitation: 
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17797777?extsite=MTc3OTc3NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
